pullrequest.title: Fix logic of installation of CMake configuration files in Windows

content.raw: Yes, that is perfect. I just commented here to make sure that nobody was confused by the original purpose of this PR after @scpeters linked it in [https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/478/fix-cpack-now-that-project-name-has/diff](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/478/fix-cpack-now-that-project-name-has/diff) .
